68c20c9e-f864-4ad9-afae-d3ab54eb2bc6.description: Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are fundamental to the success of our institutions. Graduate Enrollment Management (GEM) professionals are uniquely positioned to offer DEI leadership by influencing aspects of access, information, communication, strategic planning, budgeting, and staffing decisions. The DEI certificate introduces strategies to improve the diversity of candidates and ways to more successfully engage and support diverse students throughout the GEM lifecycle.
68c20c9e-f864-4ad9-afae-d3ab54eb2bc6.name: 2022 DEI Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

entity.name: NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

badge_template_activities.title: The NAGAP Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Certificate participants had to complete a three-hour in-person session, an asynchronous video series on implicit bias, and four webinars with post-tests.

141242c7-2ad4-4259-9236-e5854f87250e.description: NAGAP's Summer Professional Development Institute for Early Career GEM Professionals focuses on developing a comprehensive foundation across the GEM core competencies. These include Recruitment and Marketing; Admissions Operations; Financial Aid, Grants, and Scholarships; Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion; Student Services and Support; Advising and Retention; and Graduation and Alumni Relations.
141242c7-2ad4-4259-9236-e5854f87250e.name: NAGAP Core Competencies for Early Career GEM Professionals

issuer.summary: issued by NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

entity.name: NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participants attend a 2-day professional development institute consisting of workshops, group activities, and professional networking.

8d8c80ff-3746-4824-ab22-6bb63925d840.description: The 2022 NAGAP Institute on International Graduate Enrollment Managment focused on the full lifecycle of international graduate students. From marketing, credential evaluation, and opportunities to expand outreach, to best practices for retention and student engagement, this Institute featured university leaders and industry experts sharing recent trends and tangible ideas to implement and is appropriate for any higher education professional working with graduate international students.
8d8c80ff-3746-4824-ab22-6bb63925d840.name: 2022 Institute on International Graduate Enrollment Management

issuer.summary: issued by NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

entity.name: NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

badge_template_activities.title: The Institute was delivered virtually over five days with one to three sessions offered each day.

51b7de3b-cdad-4897-837e-b8b39693ae23.description: The NAGAP Leadership Academy is a multi-component, six-month program. Two in-person seminars, accompanied by monthly webinars, leadership assessments, and coaching, all culminating with a capstone project, are part of the leadership development journey.
51b7de3b-cdad-4897-837e-b8b39693ae23.name: Leadership Academy Class of 2020

issuer.summary: issued by NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

entity.name: NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

alignments.name: Capstone Project
alignments.description: Participants demonstrate their learning and professional growth through a capstone project. They will present their capstone project at the conclusion of the program.

badge_template_activities.title: Participants complete a 360-degree feedback assessment and leadership coaching. Monthly workshops focus on the development of leadership skills in Graduate Enrollment Management. Each participant links their learning to a real challenge or opportunity at their campus or organization through a capstone project, which they present at the conclusion of the program.

662e7871-6ec7-4c72-8a2f-2511892f1640.description: NAGAP's Professional Development Institute for Advanced GEM Professionals focuses on the complex challenges and opportunities faced by those with five or more years of experience. These include Enrollment Marketing and SEO; GEM Challenges and Trends; Legal Issues and Trends; Optimizing Tuition Discounting Strategies; and Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.
662e7871-6ec7-4c72-8a2f-2511892f1640.name: NAGAP Institute for Advanced GEM Professionals

601f9dea-f392-4672-bd1d-1be3d42c8f32.description: NAGAP GEM Summit attendees are provided opportunities to earn a certificate demonstrating their achievement of holistic professional development across 7 educational domains: (1) Recruitment & Marketing, (2) Money Matters, (3) GEM Operations, (4) Student Lifecycle, Engagement, & Support, (5) Enrollment Modeling & Strategic Planning, (6) Career, Staff, & Personal Development, and (7) Diversity & Inclusion.
601f9dea-f392-4672-bd1d-1be3d42c8f32.name: 2023 NAGAP Summit GEM Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

entity.name: NAGAP, The Association for Graduate Enrollment Management

badge_template_activities.title: We are pleased to offer a complimentary certificate of completion that is earned by attending a series of sessions at each NAGAP GEM Summit. The certificate includes sessions that address each of the seven educational domains to help enhance members' skill sets across the GEM lifecycle. Sign up to participate as part of the GEM Summit registration. Participants who complete the requirements will receive a certificate.
